skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I build responsive and interactive web interfaces using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript, along with libraries like React.js. My focus is on delivering a smooth user experience with clean and efficient code.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I develop reliable and scalable back-end systems using Java and Spring Boot, with strong database management using MySQL. I work on creating RESTful APIs and integrating data with front-end applications.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I create user-centric design prototypes using Figma, focusing on layout, consistency, and usability. My design approach ensures a seamless bridge between user expectations and technical implementation.

portfolio.title: Snake Game
portfolio.description: A classic Snake Game developed using Java Swing, showcasing core Java concepts and GUI design. The game features smooth controls, collision detection, and real-time score tracking.

portfolio.title: Project Portfolio
portfolio.description: A responsive portfolio website highlighting my web development projects and technical skills. Built using modern UI/UX principles and React for seamless navigation

portfolio.title: Online Banking Application
portfolio.description: Designed and developed a user-friendly online banking interface using React.js. Features include login, fund transfer, transaction history, and responsive UI components.
